data.meanings: to serve, worship or adore; to protect, grant refuge, preserve save, rescue, liberate; object of worship ie God; (Alif-Lam-Lam-ha) God, the one true God applied as a proper name denoting the true god, comprising all the excellent divine names; a unity comprising all the essences of existing things.
data.sentence: The word اللَّهُ comes from the root ا ل ه and is associated with the meanings: to serve, worship or adore; to protect, grant refuge, preserve save, rescue, liberate; object of worship ie God; (Alif-Lam-Lam-ha) God, the one true God applied as a proper name denoting the true god, comprising all the excellent divine names; a unity comprising all the essences of existing things.
The word أَنْتَ comes from the root ا ن ت and is associated with the meanings: you (singular)

data.meanings: to be close, near, follow, be up to.tawalla (prf. 3rd. m. sing.) - turneth away.tawallau (prf. 3rd. m. pl.) - they turned away.tawallaitum (prf. 2nd. m. pl.) - ye turned away.yatawalla (impf. 3rd. m. pl.) - he turns away.
data.sentence: The word أَوْلِيَاءَ comes from the root و ل ي and is associated with the meanings: to be close, near, follow, be up to.tawalla (prf. 3rd. m. sing.) - turneth away.tawallau (prf. 3rd. m. pl.) - they turned away.tawallaitum (prf. 2nd. m. pl.) - ye turned away.yatawalla (impf. 3rd. m. pl.) - he turns away.

data.meanings: to entrust, confirm, give, charge, dispose affairs, lean upon, reply upon.
data.sentence: The word بِوَكِيلٍ comes from the root و ك ل and is associated with the meanings: to entrust, confirm, give, charge, dispose affairs, lean upon, reply upon.

data.meanings: To guard, protect, take care of, watch, put in store, preserve, learn by heart.
data.sentence: The word حَفِيظٌ comes from the root ح ف ظ and is associated with the meanings: To guard, protect, take care of, watch, put in store, preserve, learn by heart.
